Text:
Please for the love of god stop using shit image hosts.

No way in hell will I disable my script blocker for that porn ridden shit site that you hosted the screen shots on.

Also, the quality for this one is well...garbage. Resolution is way too low and you can barely make out what is going on.

You know at some point if you go into a theater and the resulting video you have is absolute shit, you should just re-attempt it at a later time. Don't give me that "don't complain because it's free" bullshit.

If someone makes a pizza that literally taste like dog shit but offers it for free...do you honestly say you would want it or justify it's existence because it's free? There need to at least be a minimum standard for things like this and even this is a big fail.

thanks but no good
V.7

A.0
